message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today for $20,000.  I think it will be very valuable for you.

Alice, your offer is a bit too high for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $12,000. This is a fair price considering my budget and the value I see in this product. What do you think?

Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your budget constraints, however,  $20,000 is the lowest I'm willing to go. This product is truly unique and I believe you'll find it invaluable in the long run.
